title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and Percentage of respondents in each Cause of ransomware infection on the y axis.

Spam/phishing emails is higher than any other categories with value 67.0, followed by Lack of cyber security training, and Weak passwords/access management. Down to category Malicious websites/web ads with the lowest value of 16.0.
The highest value at Spam/phishing emails is almost 4.19 times larger than the minimum value of Malicious websites/web ads.
The highest value at Spam/phishing emails is almost 4.19 times larger than the minimum value of Malicious websites/web ads.
The difference between the max Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and min Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads is 51.0.
